module-option.name: principalsQuery
module-option.value: select password_hash from semantikos.smtk_user where username = ?

module-option.name: rolesQuery
module-option.value: select p.name as role, 'Roles' as rolegroup from semantikos.smtk_user u, semantikos.smtk_profile p, semantikos.smtk_user_profile up where u.username = ? and u.id = up.id_user and up.id_profile = p.id
